name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic pizza with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil.

reviews.comment: Delicious pizza! The crust was perfect and the toppings were fresh.
Good pizza but could use more basil.

name: Cheeseburger
description: Juicy cheeseburger with lettuce, tomato, and pickles.

name: Sushi Platter
description: Assorted sushi platter with fresh fish and vegetables.

name: Veggie Salad Bowl
description: A fresh and healthy salad bowl with a variety of vegetables.

name: Chicken Biryani
description: Aromatic basmati rice cooked with tender chicken and Indian spices.

name: Pad Thai
description: Stir-fried rice noodles with tofu, shrimp, peanuts, and tamarind sauce.

name: Falafel Wrap
description: Crispy falafel wrapped with hummus, vegetables, and tahini sauce.

name: Chocolate Cake
description: Rich and moist chocolate cake topped with creamy frosting.

name: Grilled Salmon
description: Fresh salmon grilled to perfection with herbs and lemon.

name: Taco Trio
description: Three flavorful tacos filled with meat, salsa, and toppings.
